Privacy Policy

Last updated: January 21, 2026

1. Introduction

Welcome to Retaining Walls Melbourne. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you as to how we look after your personal data when you visit our website (regardless of where you visit it from) and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

2. Data We Collect

We may collect, use, store and transfer different kinds of personal data about you which we have grouped together follows:

  • Identity Data includes first name, last name.
  • Contact Data includes billing address, delivery address, email address and telephone numbers.
  • Technical Data includes internet protocol (IP) address, your login data, browser type and version.

5. Contact Details

If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at:

Retaining Walls Melbourne

Email: info@retainingwalls.com
